title: Lamb and spinach filo tart
ingredients: ['glug of olive oil', '1 onion, roughly chopped', '100g spinach', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '300g leftover roast lamb', '2 teaspoons sun-dried tomato paste', '1/2 glass white wine', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon nutmeg', '1 pack filo pastry', '100g grated haloumi', '100g ricotta or other soft cheese', '2 sliced tomatoes']
